=== About me ===

** 28 years old, French, living in Paris.
** System Engineer, specialized in LDAP architectures, Web/Intranet services and Microsoft's technologies (nobody's perfect...)
** Using Linux for 4 years, but only in an enterprise server environnment (mostly Debian). New to Linux on the desktop (04/2005).
** Actually reorganising my professionnal life arround free software :)

=== Interests ===

** Informatics.
** Marine Biology, and especially Sharkology.

=== Misc ===

** Work on the kde simplification and global default settings (kubuntu-default-settings package).
** Work on bluez package, with pinwrapper script to make it compatible with kde-bluetooth.
** Work on NetworkManager and Knetworkmanager packages to have them in Ubuntu.
** Patches for kdebase (example: fix system:/ protocol to avoid kicker-system-applet issues)
** Diverse contributions/corrections on http://wiki.ubuntu-fr.org and http://wiki.ubuntu-fr.org
** Help on IRC/Freenode, channels #kubuntu-fr, #kubuntu, #kubuntu-devel, #ubuntu-motu.
** Moderator of the French section of <nowiki>[[http://www.kubuntuforums.net|Kubuntu Forums]]</nowiki>, whenever I don't have the time to post as much as I would like to...
** Member of the kubuntu CC.

=== Future ===

** Work on the implementation of Oskar, which should replace kaffeine/kmplayer.
** Work on kubuntu-default-settings, to make kde even more simple and efficient.
** Work on the wireless part of KDE, and eventually make KWlan the default, replacing WlAssistant.
** Think and propose new apps for kubuntu default install (example: Knetstats, Media Tag Tools...)
** Finding time to help on Rosetta, which I really want to do, but don't have the time actually.
** Finish the merge of kde apps for edgy (including about 35 packages to merge or simply add since they are not still packaged)
** Take time to revu packages on REVU (impossible until July 27 due to lack of time)
